title: Saw Rek'Sai

embed.description: I bet you can come up with a better name for the skin haha, suggestions are always welcome. -------------- Name ideas: Rek'Saw, Mech'Sai, Mecha Rek'Sai, Junkyard Rek'Sai, Jig'Sai, Full Metal Rek'Sa...

body:
Personaly, i think they have to make more skins for people who only have 1 skin. Like this one for rek'sai! 

Here is the link again: http://artsed.deviantart.com/art/Saw-Rek-Sai-skin-idea-530627802

Pls Riot, make this skins, and more skins for people who only have 1 skin!

replies.body: Rek'saw?

> [{quoted}](name=usul1202,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EbgZhjtH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-11T14:53:11.299+0000)
>
> Rek'saw?

dammit beat me to it
I saw what needed to be said, so i said it.
Give this man an Oscar! {{champion:421}} <-------- we are doing it for this lady
What a unique idea, I like this but I'd call it subterranean so nautilis has a friend

Subterranean is probably going to be one of those random one off skins they make into a line. It'd be kinda cool to have some champs themed to look like industrial power machines, since that has a distinct, gritty aesthetic that none of the current 'robot skins' haven't really captured. They're either streamlined killing bots (Eternium), Gundam knock offs (Mecha), or Decepticons (Battlecast).

That said, I'd love to see a Subterranean Cho'Gath where he's a forklift or something lol.
Fork'gath....Cho'lift! I could dig that hehehe get it.
hehehe, i like you...
I like the sentiment, but I'm pretty sure Rek'Sai is already subterranean. :)
smart name! I like it!
This reminds me a lot of that old sci-fi flick "Screamers".
Once it gets inside, that's when the killin' starts.
I was thinking "Mech'Sai," actually.
Nice one, that has to be the best!
I'd rather have shark/water reksai
Pool party Rek'Sai!
GO POOL PARTY! draw it, i really like to see that idea!
Shark'sai

Personally I think the robotic skin she already has is enough for now, and would rather see them do something else. I want them to do more skins, but i don't want this. Not to say it isn't an interesting concept.
This could be Full Metal Rek'Sai, kinda fits the grinding saw theme that Rammus has. Great idea! Although sadly I doubt Rek's next skin will be robotic since her release skin is.
+1 for rek'saw
GET TEEMO
I like you... i really do...
Looks like a digimon

Full Metal and Junkyard seem like the best fit. This is easily the BEST Rek'Sai concept I've seen since her release, though. Very well done. Love the frayed wires and the caution guard in front of the saw. The tunnel makes sense, and the fact that she has Satan running just makes it _that _ much better.
Yeah! give this man a fire extinguisher cuz he's ON FIRE!
If riot doesn't make this, they obviously hate us.
true... totally true...   LISTEN TO THIS GUY RIOT!
Wouldn't this be a Mecha Rek'Sai?
Metal Gear Rex'ai?

screamer rek'sai
http://www.vorterix.com/malditosnerds/images/notes/top10/47e87d_Screamers-8.png
already been done :)

> [{quoted}](name=PapaGreg21,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EbgZhjtH,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-05-11T20:44:16.226+0000)
>
> I wouldn't mind seeing this made like the saw canine in Metal Gear Rising. They could even make it a project skin like yasuo.

That kinda looks more like it could be a PROJECT: Nidalee skin and that's what the cougar form looks like
that skin is badass.

I **dig ** it!  

Nice concept art.  Reminds me of the machines from the horror movie series Screamers.
This would be an amazing skin
Amazing
i would pay alot of money for this skin xD                         {{champion:421}}
Subterranian Rek'Sai? (Go along with Subterrainian Naut?)
WOW cant say enought riot better put this ingame this look sick
I want this!
Rek'sai is a fairly new champ, so she will eventually get a second skin.
but it would be great if that skin would be this one, right?
Oh yeah its such a great concept.
Rekt'Sai Kappa
Yes pls, we need Debonair Zac.
Rek'Saw or Mech'Sai
Excavator Rek'Sai?
Call it... Subterranean rek'sai
